mapper.sql: serial_number, apply_phone, apply_name, follow_state, apply_time, follow_man, update_time, remarks, reserve_field1, reserve_field2, reserve_field3
mapper.select:
select
from js_sys_apply where 1=1
and DATE(apply_time) >= DATE(#{startTime})
and DATE(apply_time) <= DATE(#{endTime})
and follow_state = #{followState}
mapper.insert: insert into js_sys_apply (serial_number, apply_phone, apply_name, follow_state, apply_time, follow_man, update_time, remarks, reserve_field1, reserve_field2, reserve_field3) values (#{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{followState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{followMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserveField1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserveField2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserveField3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

serial_number,
apply_phone,
apply_name,
follow_state,
apply_time,
follow_man,

remarks,
reserve_field1,
reserve_field2,
reserve_field3,

mapper.update:
update js_sys_apply
apply_phone = #{applyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_name = #{applyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
follow_state = #{followState,jdbcType=CHAR},
apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
follow_man = #{followMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserve_field1 = #{reserveField1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserve_field2 = #{reserveField2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserve_field3 = #{reserveField3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update js_sys_apply set apply_phone = #{applyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_name = #{applyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, follow_state = #{followState,jdbcType=CHAR}, apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, follow_man = #{followMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserve_field1 = #{reserveField1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserve_field2 = #{reserveField2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserve_field3 = #{reserveField3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
